players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Suspicious about Diana, keep an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Will do, keeping an eye on both Diana and Alice. Any clues?"
Diana: "I'm the detective, be cautious. Bob is mafioso."
You: "Watch out for Diana, she's the detective. Stay united."
Diana: "Bob is mafioso, watch him. I'm the detective."
Charlie: "Will keep an eye on Bob and Diana. Any clues?"

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "Will do, keeping an eye on both Diana and Alice. Any clues?"
You: "I'm the detective, be cautious. Bob is mafioso."
Bob: "Watch out for Diana, she's the detective. Stay united."
You: "Bob is mafioso, watch him. I'm the detective."
